sentences.sentence: Finally, it gives a example to deal with problems in the model aggregation and disaggregation.
sentences.translation: 最后通过一个实例的描述来探讨模型聚合与解聚的有关问题。

sentences.sentence: Disaggregation removes the association between one or more child EPC values and a parent EPC value in the back end system.
sentences.translation: Disaggregation删除后台系统中一个或多个子epc值和父epc值之间的关联。

sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, part of crystalline disaggregation and increase of crystalline size are also due to the catalysts deactivation.
sentences.translation: 另外，在反应过程中，催化剂部分晶相发生破坏以及晶胞尺寸的增大，也对其失活有一定的作用。
